title: Georgia's Equipment & Generator Dealer | Yancey
text: As Georgiaâ€™s authorized dealer for CAT, Bluebird, Autocar, and Weiler, we are your exclusive source for the latest innovative technology that will save you money, increase your productivity and keep your team working safely and effectively. From the smallest job to the biggest, from Augusta and Albany to Savannah and Valdosta, Yancey has been providing construction equipment, power, bus and spotter truck sales, parts and service to Georgia businesses since 1914.
